channel.title: Best Friends Animal Rescue
channel.description: This website is a virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Woofstock 2023
item.description: Join us on July 29th, 2023 at American Legion Post 28 - Tickets available now! Want to help by sponsoring or donating? Do that here Please join Best Friends Animal Rescue (BFAR) in July 2023 for our 1st annual Woofstock charity event! Best Friends Animal Rescue is a 501(c)3 non-profit founded in order to serve the State of Alaska by bringing in...
